data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hendrickx, M. E., Hernández-Payán, J. C. (2018): Redescription of the mysid Petalophthalmus armiger Willemoes-Suhm, 1875 (Crustacea: Mysida: Petalophthalmidae) and distribution off western Mexico. Zootaxa 4444 (3): 283-298, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4444.3.4
